abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert of works by Richard Rodgers, Mary Rodgers and Adam Guettel performed by singer Judy Kuhn as part of Lincoln Center's American Songbook series at Appel Room.
lead_paragraph: Judy Kuhn sang music from three generations of the Richard Rodgers dynasty as part of Lincoln Center’s American Songbook series.

headline.seo: Judy Kuhn’s Homage to a Family of Composers in the American Songbook Series

snippet: Judy Kuhn sang music from three generations of the Richard Rodgers dynasty as part of Lincoln Center’s American Songbook series.

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations
